parameters.name: revision
parameters.description: The revision number of the pathway (use 0 for most recent)

get.description: getPathwayInfoGet some general info about the pathway, such as the name, species, without downloading the GPML.
getPathwayHistoryGet the revision history of a pathway.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Limit by time, only history items after the given

get.description:
getRecentChangesGet the recently changed pathways.
Note: the recent changes table only retains items for a limited time (2 months), so there is no guarantee that you will get all changes when the timestamp points to a date that is more than 2 months in the past.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Get the changes after this time

get.description: loginStart a logged in session, using an existing WikiPathways account. This function will return an authentication code that can be used to excecute methods that need authentication (e.g. updatePathway).
getPathwayAsDownload a pathway in the specified file format.

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: The file type to convert to, e.g.

parameters.name: revision
parameters.description: The revision number of the pathway (use 0 for most recent)

get.description:
updatePathwayUpdate a pathway on the wiki with the given GPML code.
Note: To create/modify pathways via the web service, you need to have an account with web service write permissions. Please contact us to request write access for the web service.

parameters.name: revision
parameters.description: The revision the GPML code is based on

post.description:
createPathwayCreate a new pathway on the wiki with the given GPML code.
Note: To create/modify pathways via the web service, you need to have an account with web service write permissions. Please contact us to request write access for the web service.

parameters.name: gpml
parameters.description: The GPML code for the new pathway

parameters.name: species
parameters.description: Optional, limit the query by species. Leave

get.description: removeCurationTagRemove a curation tag from a pathway.

parameters.name: tagName
parameters.description: The name of the tag to apply

parameters.name: tagName
parameters.description: The name of the tag to apply

parameters.name: revision
parameters.description: The revision this tag applies to

get.description: getCurationTagsGet all curation tags for the given tag name. Use this method if you want to find all pathways that are tagged with a specific curation tag.
getCurationTagsByNameGet all curation tags for the given tag name. Use this method if you want to find all pathways that are tagged with a specific curation tag.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Only include history from after the given date

get.description: getColoredPathwayGet a colored image version of the pathway.

parameters.name: revision
parameters.description: The revision of the pathway (use '0' for most recent)

get.description: findInteractionsFind interactions defined in WikiPathways pathways.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The name of an entity to find interactions for (e.g. 'P53')

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The database code to translate to (e.g. 'S' for UniProt).

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query, can be a pubmed id, author name or title keyword.

parameters.name: termId
parameters.description: The identifier of the term in the ontology

parameters.name: termId
parameters.description: The ontology term identifier in the ontology
